title: "Kids were freaking out": Florida school shooting witness
text:
"Kids were freaking out": Florida school shooting witness Wednesday, February 14, 2018 - 01:08 
A witness to the Florida school shooting says ''kids were freaking out'' when shots rang out inside Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School on Wednesday afternoon. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A witness to the Florida school shooting says "kids were freaking out" when shots rang out inside Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School on Wednesday afternoon. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
